name: Shield Dungeon
description:
Finally made the jump to GMS2, and I made this short, 14-level game to get some practice with the changes. Use the mouse to aim the shield and WASD to move around. Bounce the bullets back at the enemies to kill them. Enemies that fire bullets must be killed for the door to open.

The game records your time and tells you how fast you were at the end.

For now only a Windows executable exists. I will post an HTML5 build sometime down the line.

GRAPHICS USED:

Font: https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-1bit-roguelike-tiles-bitmap-font

Sprites: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Big thanks to them for the assets.
